turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please start an order with the nearest Starbucks coffee store

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Starbucks Coffee order started for store location on Somerville Ave in Somerville, MA

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order a Cappucino?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Cappucinno ordered. What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a Venti

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add cream or milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: add 2% milk please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add sugar?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One teaspoon of sugar please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add any flavor shots?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you you like to add anything else to the drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like the drink at the Somerville location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all you want to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yes

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: One venti cappucinno ordered at Starbucks Location in Somerville, MA. Receipt is texted to your phone and the drink will be ready in 15 minutes.
